Reviews.Title: Sony cameras for life!
Reviews.Author: KD
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure about taking the plunge, but I am so glad that I did!  I did 6 months of extensive research for this camera, as I was scared that nothing could replace my old Sony.  Almost 5 years ago, we purchased a Sony Super Steady Shot (5.1 mega pixels, was over $500 at the time) when we had our 1st baby.  Sticker shock aside, I have no regrets purchasing that camera, as it has given me professional quality pictures of my family that I treasure.  Fast forward 4 years, now I have 2 very active little boys and the old camera is showing its age.  The shutter speed is seriously lagging and the old camera just can't keep up with our busy boys.Enter the DSC W330.  My husband purchased this camera for me for Mother's Day and received a free case and memory card with it!  I have been talking for years about how I needed a small point and shoot for my purse, but thought nothing could be as good as my bulky Steady Shot.  In fact, for the first few weeks of owning this camera, I carried both in my purse, afraid that I was going to miss a moment.  I was afraid that a $150 camera could not possibly compare to my beloved Steady Shot.  Not the case.  With the DSC W330, I get clear, beautiful photos and 99% of the time the camera is on easy mode.  My kids move around quickly and I still get amazing shots of them.  Not one time have I thought the shutter speed was slow or that the smile finder was not good quality.My only complaint is the volume on the videos.  To watch a video and hear it very clearly, I have to plug it into the TV and turn the TV volume way up.  For the pictures this delivers, it is a quirk I can live with.If you want a professional camera with no plastic parts, I highly doubt you will find that for the $150 range.  If you want a small, compact camera that takes fast, high quality pictures, take the plunge!  My old camera sits on a shelf in the kitchen, officially retired.  That says a lot!  If you are in doubt, give the DSC W330 a chance, you will not regret it!

Reviews.Title: Fabulous Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Debbie west chester PA
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough about this camera. I took it to Europe and the quality of the pictures is amazing. The zoom is crystal clear. Its super easy to use, just point and shoot. The large screen is so nice to have. The size of the camera is small and slim, easy to put in a pocket or purse.

Reviews.Title: Great value, great camera
Reviews.Author: L. McNulty
Reviews.Content: I love Sony cameras, this is the 3rd I've had (first was old and second was stolen). This camera has everything I was looking for:1. Slim2. Easy to use3. Quick shutter4. Large viewscreen5. Good zoomI did my research and even went into Best Buy to ask about the best cameras. If you are looking for a basic point and shoot, you will likely be very happy with this purchase. It is a great price for the quality camera.

Reviews.Title: Great pics sony quality.
Reviews.Author: F. A. Kazi
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife and she just loves it. The 14.1 mega pixels let us blow up pictures of our baby and still keeps it clear.The only reason i gave it a 4 star and not a five is because the auto smile shutter is not as accurate as a samsung we purchased and the menu features are not as intutive as those on some other cameras. Also the battery has to be removed for charging and one has to purchase a charger from sony if you dont decide to remove the battery. i think the charger needs to come with it.I like the fact that it uses a SD card and has other options.The LCD screen is really nice and big compared to other cameras.Has great pictures even in low light.Other than that it is a great point and shoot and one of the best we had. I recently purchased a samsung for my mother in law but i think this is better.Also Amazon got me a better deal than sony direct and even shipped a lot faster full marks to you amazon thats why we are loyal.Cheers and good luck on the camera.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the price.
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a gift for my younger sibling and was shocked at how well it performed from a beginner's point of view. I was pleasantly surprised to see the camera recorded video (albeit SD) since there was no mention of it on Amazon or Sony Style. I have the Sony DSC-HX5V 10.2MP CMOS Digital Camera with 10x Wide Angle Zoom with Optical Steady Shot Image Stabilization and 3.0 inch LCD on pre-order for myself and can't imagine how impressive the image quality will be since I don't see a point and shoot getting much better than this Sony DSC-W330 from a technical standpoint.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price and compact!
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: I went by the ratings and also word of mouth before buying this camera and I actually bought 2 cameras... one Panasonic Lumix 12 MP and this Sony 14.1 MP.  Upon first site, the Panasonic appears to be built better.  The buttons were larger and the camera was a little heavier.  I thought, for sure, I'd keep the Panasonic.  Well, after trying both of them simultaneously the Sony took better pictures.  The Sony has a Carl Zeiss lense which is a very good lense.  Of course, all cameras have brightness adjustments, etc, but the Sony knew when to let more light in when there was not enough light (great for dim light pics). I'm sure the Panasonic could do the same if you want to keep adjusting the lighting, but I want a camera that is going to take great pics with pointing and shooting and this camera does just that.  The reason the imaging takes longer to see clearly on the LCD when you go back to view pics, I would assume, is because it is a 14.1 Mega Pixel (a lot of information) at a great price so it takes a 1/4 sec to focus the pic in clearly!  I don't mind it.  I'd rather have great pics when transporting them onto a computer, viewing them on the computer or TV or printing them.  Also, when you go into a photo editor, the clarity is scary. You can see every little detail. If you want to spend another $30 there's also the Sony W350, which will allow for viewing high def videos on your high def TV, but I viewed a video I took with the W330 and the clarity is still great.

Reviews.Title: Pros and Cons
Reviews.Author: Myra Binnicker
Reviews.Content: I picked this camera up for $80 at a national chain store, in their electronics center.Pros:The 14.1 MP takes very crisp and clear shots. The camera is quite thin, and slides right into a front or back jeans pocket (although I am sure you should be careful when doing this). They come in a variety of nice colors. The menus are simple to navigate. The battery life is above the average of my last few digital cameras. There are some cool options for the focus types. There is a beach focus that really makes the blues in the water pop. It works nicely for shots with a lot of blue open sky behind them as well. It picks up great detail, and is easy to use. With the right focus selected, it even does quiet well in low light conditions. I am very, very happy with the photos that I have taken with this camera. You can use either an SD or a Duo memory card in the same slot.Cons:They only use N type lithium rechargeable, so if you run out of batteries at the beach, there is no running into the gas station to grab spares. The USB port is a nonstandard size, but if you have an SD card slot on your computer, that is not a huge deal. The on screen crop is a bit complicated to figure out.Wrap Up:If you are responsible with the mini USB cable, and plan ahead where batteries and chargers are concerned, this is an awesome little camera. The quality of photos makes up for the inconveniences of not having more standard parts.Update:I have had this camera for about a year now. I have found that due to its slim size, I tend to have it in my pocket more often, resulting in fewer missed photo opportunities. I started out with the Duo card, but found it was easier to deal with the SD. The SD made for simple transfers, since I did not have to worry with finding the single USB cable that worked with it. I have found myself wishing that it had a little bit more reach with the zoom, but I am still very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Gwyn Page
Reviews.Content: Years and years ago I purchased a Sony Cyber-Shot (one of the first at 4.0 MP!) and LOVED it!  It served me well all these years until it became too bulky for me to cary around and bring with me.  I wasn't using it so I gave it to a family member about a year ago who didn't have any digital camera and she loves it!For a little more than a year I've been searching and trying out various cameras and had not found one that could live up to how the old Sony Cyber-Shot made me feel... until I found this one!  Buying this camera has been like buying that first one so many years ago; I'm excited to take beautiful pictures and have instant access to them.  The quality blows me away and the new intuitive features are amazing.  For the price you absolutely can't go wrong!

Reviews.Title: works for what I needed
Reviews.Author: Pleasantly Suprised
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera on an impulse. I went home for a week and had two graduations and a wedding to go to. After trying to take pictures at the first graduation I realized quickly I would need a new camera that night.The picture quality is excellent! I love the steady shot and the shutter speed has been able to take great pictures of family and friends in motion. I was originally hoping for a camera that took batteries, I can carry around AA's easily and was worried that the battery would be a hassel. The battery life has worked wonderful (and believe me I used this camera a lot in the past week). It also takes a relatively short amount of time to charge which is nice.The camera does take a few seconds to load a picture to view it, which can be very annoying when looking at more than a few pictures. Video quality is good and easy to use but the sound is quiet(not a big deal to me since my last camera didn't do sound). It also makes a lot of sound while taking pictures which can be annoying if you are trying to be quiet (like when the bride walks down the asile). I also have a little difficulty opening up the AVI output and battery area.Overall this camera did great. It's slim enough that I could hide it in my dress at a wedding, the pictures were wonderful, and the battery life was great. After three full days of use, turning it on and off repeatedly for several hours and taking pictures in various conditions (inside, outside, low light, bright light, movement, ect) I have over 500 good pictures and still have half the battery left.After doing some research online and using this camera like I have I can safely say I would buy this camera again.

Reviews.Title: Not a winner.
Reviews.Author: Jason B. Gusmann
Reviews.Content: I recently dropped my Canon camera in water and needed something to replace it, and FAST. This camera was cheap, looked nice and had some good reviews. On the surface it really is nice, good zoom and the screen is beautiful. But once I started to use it more, I was disappointed. It takes forever to take a picture without the flash due to face detection and it can't take until it's focused, which makes the pictures nice but it's hard to capture a fast moment. It ruins it. Second, you can't store the photos unless you drag them and drop them onto your computer screen. What a hassle. And third, the battery life is terrible. I charge it and two hours later, it's dead. Overall, I'd say keep looking if you're looking for something more advanced.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Michael P. Dawson "a_grim_repo"
Reviews.Content: I've been reading the reviews and I felt as though I need to clarify somethings.1. This Camera takes excellent photos I know a lot of people complain about how blurry they are but that's only because they look at the photos from the lcd display they never actually inspect them from the computer. When you view photos on the (actual) camera they look bad simply because the screen is not equipped to handle them When you actually print the photos or look at them on a computer monitor the quality shows.2. Speaking of photos it does take a while to take a photo about 2 secs for the camera to auto focus and to take the shot. So that I agree with.That means if you spin in circles and take a picture yes it will come out blurry.3. The video does not record sound very well but does work hard to eliminate background noise. I was playing the radio in the background and only my voice registered.4. 14 MP means you can zoom in for days(through the computer) which is what I love. I like being able to take a picture and read someone's license plate from 100 yards away.Overall I bought this Camera to take pictures of my car and show off to my family. I don't expect to be able to take a high quality picture of the moon or driving 80 miles an hour but I do expect it to take pictures of people posing and stationary objects and it does that wonderfully. After all it is only 109 dollars.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Veronica Jimenez
Reviews.Content: I just bought this camera a week ago and it works amazingly. The quality of the image is great and I love the features it has such as the smile detector and its ability to recognize the setting of the picture you are trying to take whether it is a landscape shot or a night shot. It is also not as complicated as some other cameras I have had. Overall it was a great buy and I would recommend it. I cannot wait to use it in Europe!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: My awesome boyfriend, who bought me the camera for my birthday, was looking for a camera that didn't have such a long delay between pictures and this is it! Mere nanoseconds after turning on the camera it is ready for some picture taking. The pictures are crisp and clear and the image stabilization works great. The red eye and trim features right on the camera are handy and the smile capture is a bonus. Especially when you have kids :) I highly recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: Excellent small camera
Reviews.Author: Udo
Reviews.Content: Tiny, handy, excellent quality, manual override, ISO up to 3200, 14.1 MP, Zeiss Lens and it is a SONY. What else can you expect? Sony DSC-W330 14.1MP Digital Camera with 4x Wide Angle Zoom with Digital Steady Shot Image Stabilization and 3.0 inch LCD (Black)

Reviews.Title: nice, depending on what you are interested in.
Reviews.Author: C. Mcgibbon
Reviews.Content: this product is nice, has great features. If you are looking for features like panoramic picture taking and burst shots, then get the 350. It bought both and prefer the 350. The 330 is still a nice camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Sharon L. Courselle
Reviews.Content: I originally bought this camera package for my daughter for her b'day and loved it so much that I purchased another one for my husband for our anniversary trip.  It is so compact and lightweight and yet, takes great pictures.  Would recommend this to everyone.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME camera!!!
Reviews.Content: I just got this camera in the mail yesterday replacing my old Canon Powershot which was stolen. It was only 7mp, so I knew if I got a camera that was more than double the quality, I would be satisfied- Which i was!The quality of the photos was amazing, and it was a really easy-to-use camera. I didn't really read the instructions, but i figured it out anyway! The screen is nice and big, and doesn't get dirty easily. If it does, the camera comes in this little paper thing that can be used to clean the LCD.One thing is that if you don't like noisy cameras, watch out for this one because it makes a sound every time you push a button. Personally, I think it's really cool but that's just my opinion. You may be able to mute the sound, but I'm not sure yet.The only problems I have with this camera is that first of all, I can't get open the A/V out plug thing, so that may be a problem for me. =) Another thing is that for the zoom, Amazon makes it sound like it's amazing because it's 4x OPTICAL zoom. However, it has no DIGITAL zoom, in other words, you can't zoom on the actual screen before you take a picture. It's still good, though.The color is really nice; a little darker than the picture but it's pretty. I really like the different features this camera has, like being able to crop the images on the camera.The video mode is great, because you can hear the sound when you're playing it on the camera- my old one didn't do that. The only problem with the video is that you can't zoom in/out while taking a video, and you have to make sure it's at the right place before you start taping.Anyway, this is an awesome camera and takes absolutely beautiful pictures. It's really light and can easily fit into one's pocket. I would definitely recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Below-average performance with an eventual crash
Reviews.Author: samsquamsch
Reviews.Content: I owned the DSC-W330 for about 10 months, and the pictures it took were "adequate". It struggled with any form of moving shot, requiring absolute stillness to take a shot in focus, and even then it looked pretty mediocre when you zoomed in on any part of the image; every picture has a slightly "fuzzy" quality when you zoom in. Macro shots are pretty terrible, focusing on one plane in front of the camera (and thus throwing everything else out of focus). At a macro level, the camera may focus on a plane 2 inches in front of the screen, and everything projecting forward or back from that plane is going to be out of focus. The automatic selection of what mode to shoot in was also a bit annoying at times, and I'd rather have that control to myself. Finally, most damning of all, my DSC-W330 began having technical problems about a week ago; the lens would extend, then retract, then extend again when I turned it on, and then I could use the camera. Today, however, the lens extended and retracted four times before a message saying "Please turn the camera off and on again" came up. Doing this did not fix the problem, and after a bit of searching I'm discovering it's a fairly common problem for this camera to just flat-out die on you. I bought this as a replacement for my previous Sony Cybershot W50 dying, and it looks like I'll be going with either a Panasonic or a Canon shortly. I'm not going to bother with asking for a refund or repair because it will most likely cost more than half the cost of the thing to fix, which is not worth it to me; I'd rather have a good camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera. Not great in the dark.
Reviews.Author: Sally Serrin Melena
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It has a ton of options & the pictures come out fabulous; except in low light situations. It takes awhile to focus & the pictures just don't come out very well in low light. There is also a lag for it to take the picture in low light, so if you are dancing & want to get shots off quick, this is not the camera for that. Still, I love it for all the other options.

Reviews.Title: My Opinion
Reviews.Author: Gilbert Castaneda "Gil4Real"
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this camera and i really love it. Each pic that i take looks clear and detailed. Not sure if this cam is a Hight Definition camera, but i love how clear the pictures come out. The nice blue color is a tad darker than the image shown, but it still looks nice.The only bad thing about his cam is that you cannot zoom in and out when you are recording a video, and there is no option to turn on the flash during recording. In addition, the videos that you record is clear when you recored something close but not far away. It records images that are far away a bit blurry.As far as the battery, it doesn't last that long and the charge time takes a little while. i would recommend buying a spare battery.Over-all it is a great camera to have.

Reviews.Title: Push the button and count to three
Reviews.Author: phdwilson
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for almost a year now and want to curse every time I use it.  My wife and I both hate, and I mean hate, this camera.  I have five kids and trying to capture any shot of them doing something is impossible.  There is always a terrible delay from when you push the button and when the picture is taken.At a recent awards ceremony, I tried getting a shot of my kids receiving certificates.  I missed all five shots.  AAAAAAAHHHHHHH!  I was so desperate, I switched to the three shot burst.  That did not work either.  Time for a different camera!

Reviews.Title: Excellent build and picture quailty
Reviews.Author: Bmel
Reviews.Content: I was very happy with my camera. I needed it in a hurry to bring with me on my vacation and it came in 3 days, i brought it with me and the battery life and 14.1mp saved my fun weekend. It focuses very quickly, flash is professional grade, and the picture quality is just amazing.

Reviews.Title: Sony Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Cindy K.
Reviews.Content: Bought this because my old digital camera was outdated and I wanted a camera (reasonably priced) that would take pictures in a gym, etc. I am pleased with the performance and picture quality of this camera, but am somewhat disappointed in the zoom capabilities and the quality of pictures taken in the gym, etc.  But in all fairness, I am not a professional !!  So, for the price, this is a good deal!

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot is a great beginners camera!
Reviews.Author: powe6034
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera as a product because it has some appealing features for those who need a camera that is easy to use. With the "Intelligent Auto Adjustment" mode, this camera will automatically figure out the correct setting for the scene you are trying to shoot.Like I stated in the title, I think this camera is great but just for beginners. It is a good price for what it has to offer. This camera is best for parents/grandparents who are trying to capture their family memories, preteens who want their first camera, or just someone who wants camera to bring with them just to have. It is an excellent choice!But for those who are looking for a challenging camera, or are amateur but serious photographers, this isn't the camera for you.Here are the pros and cons I found for myself personally...PROS:-Intelligent Auto Adjustment-Chargeable battery and charger-Excellent video quality-Scene selections-Compact and lightweight-HUGE screen!CONS:-Shutter speed isn't very fast-Isn't very challenging-Limited settings so I was constantly having to change the settings each place I went

Reviews.Title: sony cyber-shot 330
Reviews.Author: MontgomerySlim
Reviews.Content: This is the third of the Sony cyber shots  (DSC series) I have bought. Every time they go up in mega-bits I get a new one. I am a professional photography and have high-end cameras for paying jobs, but for fun stuff and portability you can't beat this pocket size Sony. I never leave the house without my wallet, cell and Sony camera. The 330 is even slimmer that previous models. I love all the features and I have full control of how to photo is going to come out. The Carl Zeiss lens is a big plus. I highly recommend this camera if you are looking for a point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Ready, Aim, Shoot!
Reviews.Author: A. Reynolds
Reviews.Content: Let's face it, I'm mechanically challenged.  However, with this Sony Cyber Shot I am suddenly a photographer. Honestly, I can't write to you specifics or get into details of the camera, I'm just not that knowledgable.  BUT, as a Mom with kiddos and someone who's pics are important to her, I can highly recommend this camera.  The pictures are amazingly clear and have great detail for a little point and shoot and the ease to operate the camera is awesome!  What is most incredible are the low light pictures.  Most point and shoot low light pics turn out pathetic--but not this one.  It took me 2 weeks of reading reviews from different sights and I finally settled on this one and boy am I glad I did.  One of my friends bought a point and shoot at the same time I did and hers was a lot more money (it got good reviews, too) but she ended up taking hers back and buying the same one as me.  Made me feel my choice was right because she is a very good photographer and chose the Sony Cyber Shot 14.1 as her personal point and shoot.  Can't go wrong with this one :)

Reviews.Title: Nice aim and shoot camera. Superior quality pictures.
Reviews.Author: Vinayak R Rao
Reviews.Content: On a limited budget, I would say this is a good value for money. If money wasn't my concern I would have gone for a SLR. The camera is convenient if you are looking for a nice "aim and shoot" camera and worth every penny. The quality of display (LCD) and the digital image are excellent in this range.

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: Juliet
Reviews.Content: the only drawback is that the memory card needs an adapter, which doesnt work for me. i may be using it wrong (how can i use it wrong?), but apart from that the camera works great, charges quickly, and provides quality photos.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Joe "Joe"
Reviews.Content: Cant beat it for the money. Nice big display. Easy to use. Takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: This camera has lived up to the Sony name for me so far.  The pictures are very clear.  I really like the face detection technology, too.  The only cons I can think of are as follows: 1) if you don't use flash, some of the pictures might come out a little blurry.  However, none of the pics I took using flash came out blurry.  2) It doesn't use AA batteries.  It uses a lithium ion battery, so if you forget to charge the battery and it runs out, you don't have the luxury of just popping in a fresh set of batteries.  In my opinion, the cons outweigh the pros, though.  I think it's a great camera and is definitely worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase!
Reviews.Author: hitachi13
Reviews.Content: I had just purchased a Pentax before I purchased this Sony because I loved my Pentax I had before. Unfortunately I was very disappointed with it. My best friend had an awesome camera that was a Sony so I decided to try the brand. I love my new camera! It's very compact and the picture quality is amazing! It is so easy to use that I didn't even have to read the manual first. I really love the rechargeable battery too. I think I am a Sony customer now!

Reviews.Title: Sony Camera
Reviews.Author: Velvet
Reviews.Content: My daughter researched cameras and decided on this one. It works very well, the large screen and clear images on screen are great. We're very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: My 10 year old grandson loves it
Reviews.Author: Barbara Goldman "barbara g"
Reviews.Content: After much research, I decided to buy this camera. It has everything I was looking for. It takes a crisp clear video, has the smile feature and can slip into your pocket. It's a winner.

Reviews.Title: pictures
Reviews.Author: Maynard M. Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, large screen and very sharp pictures.  Sony has outdone itself on this one!

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC 14.1MP
Reviews.Author: Sharon L. Courselle
Reviews.Content: I bought the package deal for my daughter for her birthday and so far she loves it.  Definitely need to buy the extra card but the camera is easy to use and the price was great.

Reviews.Title: powerfull flash
Reviews.Author: Mar "Marinera"
Reviews.Content: I have owned so many cameras because that what i do for living.and i can tell you this one haves a very powerful flash ! i never seen something in my life so bright.its good to have a flash like that because in doors takes nices pics.its not so slow like others say, its average like others .it takes nice colorful !! vivid pictures. you dont need to change the settings like other in vivid because this one already does it so vivid and powerfull !SORRY MY ENGLISH.

Reviews.Title: Great but...
Reviews.Author: Simon "SiOkay"
Reviews.Content: It works great and all.  Nice pictures.  Great large LCD screen, only issue is that the built-in speaker is almost inaudible.  So if you plan to playback videos on it, you will struggle hearing back anything.  Other than that, it works great!

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot 14.1
Reviews.Author: K. Down
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera, at least the battery holds up and it does take great pictures.

Reviews.Title: EASY TO USE
Reviews.Author: Andres Santana
Reviews.Content: EXCELLENT, IS VERY EASY TO USE, EXCELLENTE PICTURE, GOOD PICTURES, WAS WHAT I WAS LOCKING FOR!!

Reviews.Title: Sony
Reviews.Author: Judith D. Muellner
Reviews.Content: This is my second Sony camera and I bought this because I wanted a higher pixel number. (my old one was only 6-so time for an upgrade) I love this camera b/c it is just as easy to figure out as my last one. I hardly referred to the directions so far b/c of my familiarity with Sony. I love the upgrade of my photos. And I was able to get it in my favorite color!

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Tarnovskie
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a decent point and shoot this one should not be considered. It's terribly simplyfied, to the point where 14.1 MP seems to be the only thing you're paying for, but what's the use of sharp image if you are not satisfied with colors and light. This camera is a big disappointment especially when it comes to indoor pictures. Bottom line - it is cheap and you're getting what you're paying for.

Reviews.Title: simply disastrous...
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: We had a Sony camera for several years that finally gave up the ghost, and thought this model would make a good replacement.  Unlike the prior model, it offers virtually no user control.  Worst of all, there is a considerable delay between pushing the shutter button and the picture being taken, resulting in lots of lost shots.  There's apparently no way to adjust for bright backgrounds, so beach and snow shots are not really possible.  Pictures come out dark, and due to the delay, often blurred.  We bought one for our son and his wife, and the same issues show up in their photos.  The display is good though.....

Reviews.Title: spot on for the price
Reviews.Author: ibra
Reviews.Content: Im not a pro, I just want to keep the moment, If you are like me. This cam is for you.

Reviews.Title: Amazing deal!
Reviews.Author: aharp
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera!I have been researching for months on which camera to buy and finally decided I would go with an SLR but when I went to buy an SLR the salesmen talked me out of it and showed me this camera. I was hesitant to buy it since it was so much cheaper than I was expecting to spend but I fiugred I could always take it back. I had been looking at the canons but they honestly don't compare.This camera is probably comparable to an SLR. It can focus on up close items like flowers and takes amazing low-light shots. I absolutely love my sony! Definitely buy it! So cheap and great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera....
Reviews.Author: Barbie
Reviews.Content: I have thoroughly enjoyed this little camera. I already had a much larger camera for other uses, but this one is compact enough to carry in your purse or pocket. It is easy to use, and the pictures are great. The only drawback I have is that other brands of SD cards cannot be used in this camera. You must purchase one from Sony. I really wasn't too pleased that I was unable to use SD cards for storage that I had already purchased and had on hand. I probably would not have purchased the camera had I known that I would have to spend more money to purchase Sony's own SD card. So, whatever you spend for the camera, be ready to fork out more money for a Sony brand storage card. The internal memory holds only one or two pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera........but.
Reviews.Author: Francisco Giordano Ramirez
Reviews.Content: I buy this camera in a store, is the second Sony camera I own and if I change the first one, was only because I broke it by accident, because it was great.  This one is even better, takes great photos and videos and I really like it.  Now I'm looking for a second battery for the cam because I note one don't last enough and sometimes I 'm left without charge in the middle of something, and my surprice is that the battery cost one third of the price of the camera(some $.48.00), so the value of the camera is only $.100.00?  I think for now is too expensibe.Francisco Giordano

Reviews.Title: half working
Reviews.Author: gardenworker
Reviews.Content: Not sure it this unit only or this model's "feature" - it will randomly take unexpectedly longer time between the button down and the shutter action.

Reviews.Title: Ok camera
Reviews.Author: JesusSaves
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed the wide angle shots and it took awesome outside shots! My problem was inside, most of the time they blurred the first shot and I would have to retake them. They would be dark too. I tried making adjustments, but it didn't help. Also when I would get those blurred pictures, sometimes the moment was gone so I couldn't take a second one. My camera was dropped and damaged so I opted not to get this same camera...too many missed shots.

Reviews.Title: Neat features don't make up for crummy images
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after using a Minolta Dimage G400 which was a wonderful camera until I finally wore it out.  I anticipated an increase in image quality due to technological advancements and higher resolution.  It does not even come close to the quality of image I was getting from my 4.3 megapixel camera from 7 years ago.  I work in a technical field and understand what all the settings are for and how to use them.  I have tried every possible combination of settings with this camera and the result is a soft, mushy image with colors bleeding into each other.  The pictures just don't have a crisp high resolution, focused look not matter what I do.  My previous 4.3 megapixel camera mentioned above blows this camera away in image quality.  It is also extremely slow to focus with absolutely no point and shoot capability if you don't have an extra 2 seconds to wait for it to figure out what its doing before it takes a picture.  I have missed more of my kids smiles than I can count with this camera, by the time it takes a picture the moment is gone.  I feel like this is a classic example of new technology selling on gimmics like smile detection while leaving out the truly important basics. Focus is extremely lame, no matter what settings I use it comes out soft. Sometimes in darker conditions it will get confused and take almost 5 seconds to take a picture. If I had money growing on trees I would chuck this camera in the river and would feel a sense of glee as it sank to the bottom.

Reviews.Title: Purchase any other digital camera!
Reviews.Author: Erica Hamblen
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera on August 7, 2010, and on July 4, 2011, it stopped working.  For no reason at all the LCD display stopped working and you only see fuzzy black lines.  I am serious when I say 'for no reason'.  I did not drop this camera nor did I do anything at all to warrant it to stop working.  It is a really poor camera for the money, buy anything else.  All of the 1 star reviews were correct - it takes horrible pictures, there is a serious delay between when you push the button to take a photo.  Sometimes when you press the button you hold it and hold it and hold it and it will FINALLY snap a picture.  I have never been so disappointed in a camera before, ever.  I am sorry I tried the Sony brand and will return to Olympus, Canon, or Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Does what it should.
Reviews.Author: Capn_Undies
Reviews.Content: It does what it should, take pictures.The only thing I found I didn't like was that the battery life doesn't last as long as I would have liked and sometimes it takes the camera forever to focus.So I have people smiling and waiting for me to take a picture only for me to say "hold on."

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyper-Shot DSC-W330 14.1 MP
Reviews.Author: Ulrike Walker
Reviews.Content: I have used the camera once and downloaded the pictures into my computer. So far, so good. The little latch on the side (A/V OUT) to attach the cable for downloding is hard to open, not so good. Two things I would have liked to be a standard feature. First, that the instructions for downloading the pictures should be included in the little booklet and not only in the handbook on the CD-ROM. Second, the charger included should have had an attachment for European power outlets. But that is probably too much asked for.

Reviews.Title: Quality Purchase
Reviews.Author: Dennis Scully
Reviews.Content: This Sony Cyber-Shot W330 camera was given as a gift and is replacing an older Sony Cyber-Shot, which was used as a cushion between a ladies bum and a frozen lake.  The old camera housing was great, but the lens didn't survive the impact.  The W330 is working beautifully. Stabilization has improved, with very few blurred pictures.  I am happy with this choise and would recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: CyberShot Never Fails
Reviews.Author: CrazyFascination "Heather Andrea"
Reviews.Content: i've had my sony cybershot for about 6 months,i've had one before the 8.1mp version sadly after tons of use it broke on me,after having a kodak and sanyo after it i wanted another sony and got this,just like my sony before its never failed me,all photos are clear,crisp,and dslr like quality,i'd recommend this camera a thousand times overr

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Classy Shopper
Reviews.Content: I received my camera yesterday, I like the fact that is lightweight, takes great pictures, snaps quick, there is no delay. So enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: Great, Easy-to-Use Camera
Reviews.Author: V. Aportadera
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 13 year old daughter.  She loves it!  It is easy to use and small enough to take anywhere.  She figured out how to use it, download and print pictures from it all by herself.  The price was unbeatable too!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: oso
Reviews.Content: This camera is just awesome, i wanted something that i wont be lugging around through out the theme park and then i found this camera. The shots are awesome and even the video was nice. I was going to but an even more expensive camera but im going to just hold on tight to this camera, I love this camera it was like it wasnt even in the way. Get this camera if your going to any theme park, It wont be in your way at all.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Lydia Rose Gabbert
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing.  It takes spectacular photos, is the perfect size, shape, and the large screen size is wonderful.  It is super easy to use, and it's automatic features make it so that I don't need to change the settings for every different subject!  Plus, the RED is a beautiful color, almost a berry red shade.  I give it *****!!!

Reviews.Title: Fabulous
Reviews.Author: BiMiNiGiRL
Reviews.Content: Love this camera! Fantastic pics! Comes with charger that battery slides into to plug in wall. Say half hour, pop it in, ready to go.

Reviews.Title: Great, Affordable Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: puravida6684
Reviews.Content: The camera is exactly what I was looking for.  I had already purchased this exact camera and was buying as a gift.  The pictures are great.  If you take time to work with the settings you can get really great images.  I was also please with the cost.

Reviews.Title: Disappointment with 3rd Sony cyber-shot (this one DSC-W330)
Reviews.Author: Hiker/X-C Skier
Reviews.Content: Worked fine on one X-C ski venture in GSMNP and at Xmas eve at my son's in GA.  It then worked fine on several indoor shots in my home.  On 12/29 hike in the GSMNP it seemed to work fine for ~6 shots; then I started having problems.  These included fact that camera was not communicating with 4-GB card and that camera internal memory was full.  (Doubt if I can ever retrieve those 6 shots for their intended use.)  Then camera flat out did not work.  Procedures rec'd after calling Sony's help-line 12/30 were not valid; was told to send it in.  (Because I am making a presentation at Wilderness Wildlife Week in Pigeon Forge TN on 1/10/11; I had planned to add to my hiking in ice and snow pictures, and X-C skiing ones, in the Great Smoky Mountain National Park, I am literally screwed.My prior Sony cyber-shot developed a shutter problem after 1-2 yrs of use; although the one prior to that worked and still is, I now would not recommend Sony to anyone.  (I liked to open up pictures on my computer with Windows Explorer; loading Sony's PMB software made that so difficult with this Sony purchase of less than one month that I wondered if it related to the DSC W330's dysfunction.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC W330 14.1MP
Reviews.Author: CecyC
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera. I had an old model that I had purchased about 5 years ago finally give it out because the On button got jammed after 5 years of two small toddlers playing with them, and I hope this one lasts me just as long. It takes great pictures and video too!

Reviews.Title: Sony Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Britt-10
Reviews.Content: The price was great, and it arrived quickly. LOVE the blue color! Stands out from all the silver colored ones in my family! This is my first digital camera, so I was looking for something easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Sony always delivers
Reviews.Author: Lia
Reviews.Content: Cant beat it for the price.  If this camera is priced at the top of your budget, then I highly recommend it.  I like Sony in general and this is a great solid thin small camera with a nice side video display, good zoom and excellent quality.  After the first picture came up on the display I was impressed with the clarity.  I was able to take a great shot even in dim lighting.  The pictures are clear and brightly lit on the display during playback.  The menu features are simple to navigate.  Switching from camera to video mode is easy with the slider button on the side and there are a lot of other cool features I still need to play with (e.g. smile detection, outdoor, pet, food etc).  My only complaint would be that the battery life could last longer when using the video feature or during playback, but it does recharge quickly.  When comparing it to other models for the same price on CNET.com overall the W330 received very good ratings and I agree.(CNET.com URL)[...](Amazon Product Link)Sony DSC-W330 14.1MP Digital Camera with 4x Wide Angle Zoom with Digital Steady Shot Image Stabilization and 3.0 inch LCD (Silver)

Reviews.Title: Good point and shoot starter camera
Reviews.Author: Utkarsh Seth "Utk"
Reviews.Content: This camera is a very good point and shoot camera. The picture quality is excellent and this was something I was most interested in.Sony is  known to make good cameras.If you need a quality starter camera this is the one. You would not disappoint yourself. The battery life is nice. Please do not compare the settings with an SLR.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC W330 - Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Danielle
Reviews.Content: I received to product just a week after I ordered it. The camera itself is really nice. It makes great pictures and I love the colour of the camera. It is a great camera for portraits. The LCD screen is large so you can see your pics very good. Without a memory card you can only take 4 pictures so you also have to buy some memory for your camera as well. It is a great camera for beginners!

Reviews.Title: Just OK
Reviews.Author: E. DeJesus "EvieD"
Reviews.Content: My 7.2 megapixel cybershot seemed to take better, clearer pictures! I do NOT like that you need to remove the battery to charge it and the battery life is POOR compared to my previous Sony & Samsung point & shoot. I can't get the "smile" thing to work either. It's still Ok, nice & compact so I can take it with me everywhere and not complicated to use. I just ordered an extra battery on Ebay for $11.

Reviews.Title: GF loves it
Reviews.Author: Andrew Sorum
Reviews.Content: came clean and new takes pics great and she likes it cause its thin and pink

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Online buyer
Reviews.Content: I liked this one. its a good one for point and shoot.Recommend for every one. Its so Light weight!

Reviews.Title: Best camera ever
Reviews.Author: Hansel Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera. My girlfriend and I have a cannon, a nikon, and this sony, but the sony is the one we like the most. It is portable, easy to work with, and the quality of pictures goes beyond what we originally expected. Great camera, will definately buy it again and again.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: G. Stowers
Reviews.Content: I purchased this wonderful little camera over a month ago.  It takes great, crisp photos and is easy to focus from macro to mountains. Not happy with the USB port or the shorter than my other Sony Cybershot battery life.  One problem I just noticed is a shadow stripe thru the screen about an inch long by 1/8 inch wide.  What has caused this? It doesn't effect the quality of the photos.  Overall, I love the simplicity, easy to carry and picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Sandsjourney "Sandy"
Reviews.Content: I love everything about the camera. The only thing I miss is the macro. I had it on my Nikon and loved it for close up shots. Otherwise, great and crisp photos.

Reviews.Title: Consistent but not spectacular
Reviews.Author: D. Ezra
Reviews.Content: Have been a Kodak person forever but finally got fed up with the poor indoor/low light shots and problems with memory cards.  The sony does seem to be more consistant in low light and the video is very nice but that is about all it does better.  Also when taking outdoor pictures the Kodak is GREAT and noticablily sharper than what I have been able to get from the Sony.  Other problem is that the Sony has even a longer shutter time than the Kodak which I did not think was possible!!!

Reviews.Title: Takes beautiful pictures!
Reviews.Author: R. Savage
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera after doing much research online and in store. I decided that Sony would definitely be the best camera along with the Carl Zeiss" lense. I was looking for a camera that had a quick shutter and a clear picture. This camera along with the Sony memory card works great.

Reviews.Title: Sharp photos?  Look elsewhere.
Reviews.Author: AmazonShopper
Reviews.Content: Where this camera has a small niche is as a quick pull-it-out, shoot-and-pray camera.  You might fiddle with the settings a bit in the beginning, but it's really a one mode pony.  The biggest problem with this camera is it simply can not produce a non-blurry photo unless I put it down on the table, set a 2 second delay, press play, and then not touch it at all until the shot is done.  Literally, the simple shake of the camera from pushing the shutter button causes enough movement of the camera to blur photo (the button is quite stiff).  Terrible.  Contrary to other reviews that say "you must be break dancing while taking photos and only viewing the images on the preview screen" this is patently false.  I've held my breath, used a tripod, and the quality is poor no matter what screen I look at the photos on. Night shots with long exposure times?  Guaranteed you will get motion blur.  It may have a 14.1 MP sensor, but it's absolutely crippled by the lack of noise filtering (speckling) and shake correction (blur); I've used less expensive 8 MP cameras that produced far sharper images.Video quality is also quite poor.  You'd think they would have at least attempted to do 800x600, but alas they decided to go for 640x480.  To summarize the result, it looks the exact same as my integrated webcam from 3 years ago with no details and mediocre focus.  The quality is ok if you want to take a video of something up-close, but this camera would not even remotely come close to being a substitute for your own two eyes.Misc info - In case anyone is wondering, the battery only lasts about 50 min for video.  50 min of video (at 640x480) takes up about 3 GB or so.  Each image taken at full 14.1 MP resolution uses anywhere from 3.5 to 5 mbyte.  I wasn't really counting, but without flash you can get maybe a few hundred shots before the battery dies.  With flash on for each shot, battery is depleted much much quicker.  So if you buy an 8 GB SD card like I did, chances are you'll run out of batteries before you fill it up.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Larry "Larry"
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use and takes great pictures. The 3 inch screen is really nice.

Reviews.Title: the worst sony camera I have ever purchased
Reviews.Author: Amelie
Reviews.Content: I have had many Sony Cameras, and I usually love this brand.But this camera was a total disappointment.The auto-focus takes SO LONG to adjust, that when the camera finally clicks, the image I wanted to shoot is long gone.That, I mean, when the autofocus actually WORKS. I have never had so many blurred photos, even on a sunny day shooting images full of light- so, that's not due to a long opening time of the lenses, nor the movement of my hand- I believe it's a software problem.Moreover, the automatic exposition of the camera is horrible- images are almost always overexposed. Some of them are so bright that the subject cannot be reckognized.Basically, I hated this camera.I only gave it 2 stars because it's weight is very light , and the battery lasts a long time.

Reviews.Title: unsatisfied
Reviews.Author: Marizel Arem "emem"
Reviews.Content: I really wanted to like this camera but when i got it, it felt so cheaply made and flimsy. The lens that comes out is super wobbly. It is a great looking camera and i love that it has a 3 inch lcd but it just feels like if sony didnt try hard enough with this. The settings menu and all that looks very generic and blurry. It does take ok pictures, but it takes FOREVER to snap the picture. Me and my friends have to wait at least like 30 seconds for it to take the picture and i have to keep pressing the button for it to take the pic. I have missed so many great moments with this camera because of the amount of time it takes to snap and when it finally takes the picture, the moment is already done with. Simple camera for starters but im kind of more picky and i just was not impressed. Honestly, just dont buy it.

Reviews.Title: BEST CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Faith Snyder "fts1985"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera from best buy and the camera is so worth it. the pictures are bright and clear and its so easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed...
Reviews.Author: Kelly Vanderslice
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to replace a broken Sony camera (it didn't revive a drop).  We have been very happy with Sony cameras and have been buying them over the last 10 years.  This would have been our 5th.  I tried to like it and just couldn't.Pros:  Took nice images when it was in a setting it liked, bright with no moment.  My Sony memory cards and accessories still were usable. Plus, it was nice to have a familiar lay out and symbols.Cons:  Largest draw back which caused the camera to be returned was it took soo long to take a photo I missed my babies smiles.  It was as if the camera was thinking too hard to take a picture.  It also felt cheap.  Not sure what it's made of, guess I could look, but it felt like cheap aluminum.  Not comfy to hold.  It took awful images in low light.  There were so many things going on feature wise, face detection, smile detection, etc. it was a mess on the screen.  You could turn these off, I suppose.I'm not a camera guru by a long shot and I have a very nice Canon DSLR for professional quality pictures but I was expecting more from Sony in this point in shoot.  I sent it back and purchased a Canon PowerShot SD1400IS 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 4x Wide Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Black)  which I am thrilled to pieces with.I can not attest to the video quality as I didn't even want to take the time.  It could have taken the worlds best video and I still wouldn't have kept it.Keep Shopping!

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Brunoi30 "Bruno"
Reviews.Content: A family member received this camera for Christmas, and after taking pictures with 6 different cameras during the night everyone was baffled at how bad pictures from this camera turned out. Bad exposure and noisy, less detailed, and blurry pictures compared to the others. We were using a Canon SD1300 IS, which costs less than this camera, and it blew this one out of the water in terms of picture quality. The screen on this camera might be big, but it was of horrible quality as well. In addition, the 'Easy' mode on this camera is completely worthless and constantly cranks ISO up too high to preserve any kind of detail. I fully recommend avoiding this camera at all costs, and cannot believe how many good reviews this thing is getting.We were taking indoor family pictures with and without flash from 7-15 feet away in decent lighting, so there are no excuses for pictures turning out as bad as they did. Outdoor pictures may turn out better, but I don't think there are any saving graces for this thing.

Reviews.Title: Quality
Reviews.Author: Mevaldt
Reviews.Content: This camera is really good. Impressive image quality in a very portable device. I recommend!

Reviews.Title: Great PICTURES, not-so-great VIDEOS
Reviews.Author: Moon B.
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter. She takes it around with her almost everywhere. However, one day she wanted to record a song on the radio so she could Google the lyrics. Our radio is on top of our refrigerator. She held the camera about 1 foot above her head. She recorded the whole song and was excited to hear it play back. However, when she pressed "Play" she was puzzled. She could not hear anything. She turns up the volume, which the highest is 8... she barely heard the song. We looked closer at the camera and it seems that the only place for sound to enter is through two tiny holes in the top right corner of the camera. My daughter has to hold the camera as close as possible to the object if she wants to hear the sounds play back.On the other hand, she says that the pictures are beautiful. "If I published these pictures, people would think I'm a professional!" :) Overall, this camera is lovely for capturing pictures. But, not so great for videos. Sure the video quality is clear, but the sound is a big factor as well.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline Knight
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as gift to myself.  Truly enjoyed it.  Now I have upgraded and gave it as a gift.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Dayled Colina
Reviews.Content: I did receive this camera on time, and covered my expectations. I recommend it to buy it as this is a good product

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC- W330 14.1 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Sebastian Koylerian
Reviews.Content: So far I have bought 3 Sony DSC- W330 14.1 MP cameras as gifts for my relatives in  india and for my own use. The camera takes excellent crisp and clear pictures. The camera is light and handy.The screen  size is 3". The lense is Carl Zeiss which adds value to the performance of the camera. The wide angle lense enhances the capability of camera to take large number  of people at short distance.An excellent  product I recommend.

Reviews.Title: not the best
Reviews.Author: sk "sk"
Reviews.Content: this was first Sony camera that we bought,we had a canon before, both in the same price range, but I would definitely prefer the Canon one due to(1) better image resolution, and (2) more lasting battery charges.

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Kevin D.
Reviews.Content: We've had this for a while now and overall it's been a pretty decent camera.  My only complaint with these is the "delay" when you push down the darn button to take the picture.  What's up with that??  When I hit the button I want it to take the picture NOW, not in a couple seconds when the shot may be lost.  After we used it for a year or so we gave it to our daughter to play with and to take pics, etc..

Reviews.Title: Quality Is Not As Good As Older Models
Reviews.Author: William J. Veal
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife to replace an older, simular model. Seems like Sony has decided to cheapen it production process in order to sell to the lower end. She complains the latch on the battery door, the latch for the battery itself and the overall quality and performance of the camera is not as good as her older model.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: chirper9
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for catching those memorable moments. At 14.1 MP it takes some high quality pictures. Definitely worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Handy Enough yet versatile
Reviews.Author: Ken Tomono
Reviews.Content: This is the replacement of the prior model to fit the water proof case.The current models are some water proof.I have tried the prior model during the snorkeling in French Polynesia, For the price of the camera, there are some pros and cons but works good enough for me.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Ibrahimagic Mirzana
Reviews.Content: I've had this canera before & l love it. The pictures & colors are perfect and its small and easy to use

Reviews.Title: Poor quality pictures
Reviews.Author: Pleasant
Reviews.Content: There is a yellow tint to all the pictures.  The price was reduced, and I can see why.  The picture quality is poor also.  I would have sent the camera back, but they said it was beyond 30 day return policy.  Don't buy this camera.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC-W330
Reviews.Author: James D. Atchley "Desktop Manager"
Reviews.Content: This camera works great my other Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W330 went to Africa with my daughter. This allows me to get the movies and pictures on my computer. Thanks for getting it here so quickly!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: M. Williams "B&Okie;"
Reviews.Content: Good packaging and all worked as expected.  Takes pictures.  I have not had a chance to do any major comparison yet.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I had exactly the same camera but the screen died (they do not like the damp) but as I had memory cards etc, I was not concerned.Why pay hundreds of dollars for a camera when this used one with no visible marks on it worked a treat for $40 as I seem to rememberer what I paid for it.I use this camera for work so gets a bit of abuse, but would buy againOne big gripe about Amazon US is very few people will ship to Canada - Amazon Canada is a waste of space - hardly anything on there worth having, so a lot of us would like to buy in the US but why are people so afraid of sending to Canada? All you have to do is fill in the customs deceleration - takes a few mins but will increase sales - and WE pay the fees and taxes not you!

Reviews.Title: sony
Reviews.Author: deanna
Reviews.Content: I bought this same camera in 2009-2010 and cracked the screen.  I then replaced it with the 16.1.  Not a good decision as it seemed cheaply made.  I bought a cannon this past Christmas and it too just did not compare to the 14.1.  I just repurchased the 14.1 and to be honest I don't know if it is me or the camera but the pictures are super bright.  I havee reset everything to default settings and the "white" or "light" on the picture is out of control.  I just got it I hope to figure out why this might be.  I looked on line and it states that there might be a mechinism inside the camera that has gone bad.  The DSC-W330 is a great camera.  This one which was new in the box may just be a lemon.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: Simple but good enough to take decent photos. It has a good looking and its flash works just fine. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Best, Most Dynamic Point-and-Shoot I've ever owned!
Reviews.Author: jennb
Reviews.Content: I've recently been looking back at old photos I've taken to decorate our apartment, and keep coming back to the photos I've taken with this little guy right here. Unfortunately, it got stolen about 4 years ago and I have since moved on to more professional DSLR equipment, but this was honestly the best point and shoot camera I've ever had! The color range is excellent, and it does well in low light and with image stabilization. If you're looking for a point and shoot camera that has a long battery life, rich and saturated colors, and yet is compact and durable, trust me - especially at only 99 bucks, this is going to be the best for you!

Reviews.Title: Great pictures!
Reviews.Author: L. Speer "Eliza"
Reviews.Content: The quality of the pics are great. I have had this camera for about three years now and its still going strong. The only issue I have with it is the shooter delay. Its also important to note it focuses only after you tilt the camera. I guess I should have read the direction right when I bought it lol.

Reviews.Title: If you obtain this camera for a good price, its a great pocket camera
Reviews.Author: M. Gehret "G-Man  Colorado"
Reviews.Content: Sony makes a wide variety of digital cameras, this is sleek , well designed, large 3" screen and good firmware /software for enabling user various settings and video settings as well. This model accepts SD cards as well as sony's Pro Duo sticks. The auto settings give amateurs the opportunity to simply point and shoot.  Lens is a bit noisy compared to other models, but certainly performs well.  The buttons are a bit smaller than expected , but are well placed on the rear of the camera. Sound is above average for playback of videos.  This model does not offer HDMI output, but does have AV out for TV' or DVD recordings. If this is purchased at a good price and condition, you should have years of a decent pocket sized good quality camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome buy!
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: I like the camera a lot.  It takes very nice pics and is very user friendly.  Got a great deal so I am very, very pleased!

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: honibea
Reviews.Content: I don't buy too many cameras but I was very disappointed that this camera didn't come with a memory card

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Jose Gumercindo Sanchez F
Reviews.Content: This camera cover all the expectations that I have. It is very comfortable and the it was really easy to operate

Reviews.Title: Pink is her color
Reviews.Author: Bobbie Rosinke
Reviews.Content: This was for my daughter who takes pics all the time it has lasted really well and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: The size of the canon camera is easy to carry around.
Reviews.Author: 94shadow
Reviews.Content: The size of this canon camera is very easy to carry around and use.  Without all the complicated  functions on the camera, it is easy to set up and use.

Reviews.Title: Lots of megapixels and lots of disappointment
Reviews.Author: J. Gurney
Reviews.Content: This camera has decent specs and you'd think it would be an amazing casual camera for an average picture taker, but the picture quality is actually pretty terrible.  I can't seem to get it to take a clear picture, although, admittedly, it COULD be user error (although my husband and friends are unable to take good pictures with it as well).

Reviews.Title: Excellent Purchase
Reviews.Author: eavean
Reviews.Content: I just love this camera. All the different features on the camera is really good, esp the movies recording mode.

Reviews.Title: Best Camara for the price
Reviews.Author: JLM "JLM"
Reviews.Content: I had previously owned the same model before it got stolen and because it was such a great camera I looked for its replacement by searching for the exact same model and I found it here in amazon.com. The camara has a great image, and the video quality is good, and it is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product!,
Reviews.Author: Jesse Q "jeqk"
Reviews.Content: Buy with confident... Is a great value you won't regret....the picture quality is good... Is portable... The battery last long... Bottom line a good product!

Reviews.Title: OK, not Durable
Reviews.Author: Avid Reader
Reviews.Content: It's been close to two years since I've had this camera. In the beginning, it was fully functional and took decent pictures yet not to the crispness that I would have like to see. It's use hasn't been heavy or anything but it is now rather bothersome. The pictures always seem to come out rather blurry and the menu button doesn't work properly. I guess I've used up it's lifetime.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: This is my 7th sony camera.  I've always upgraded to another sony. This one is identicle to my last one and the ONLY reason it needed replacing is because I dropped it and shattered the lens.  You just can't go wrong with this camera!

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!
Reviews.Author: Norby R. Serrano
Reviews.Content: EVERYONE LIKES MY CAMERA.  THE PICTURE IT TAKES, THE IMAGE, THE COLOR, THE BIG 3" LCD IS FABULOUS.IT IS EASY TO USE ALSO.  FROM 1 TO 10, I GIVE IT A 10.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: ojbabs
Reviews.Content: Great product. I have been using the camera for months and still enjoying the quality with no issues so far. I strongly recommend as a good value for the price

Reviews.Title: THE RECOMMEND!!!
Reviews.Author: Mafalda
Reviews.Content: I AM SUPER HAPPY WITH MY PURCHASE. I HAVE MANAGED TO CAPTURE AMAZING IMAGES WITH THE CAMERA. IT MAKES THE AUTOMATIC ADJUSTMENT.  THERE ARE FEW PICTURES COMING OUT BLURRY OR MUCH BRIGHTNESS, I LOVE HAVING MADE A GOOD PURCHASE AND FACT HAVE AN EXCELLENT INVESTMENT

Reviews.Title: Best Camera Ever!!!!
Reviews.Author: Nydia DiCarali
Reviews.Content: I recently received this camera for my birthday. It is the best camera ever!!!! It takes beautiful pictures and videos. I really wanted a camera and I bought a Flip and it was awful. I decided to get this camera and I don't have any regrets. People say it takes forever to load and then take a picture, but it doesn't. This is the best quality of a camera I've ever had.

Reviews.Title: Didn't last a year with out major problem
Reviews.Author: mynana
Reviews.Content: I liked the camera for about 10 months. I don't like it now and will need to buy a new camera as the screen shows as blank white on the left half and about 1/3 of the bottom of the screen. Very hard to take pictures when you can't see what is in the frame. I talked with Sony and there isn't a known problem with the camera at this time. I believe that would have to pay for service for a camera that has been taken excellent care of and is less than a year old.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Performace Indoors
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: We've had this camera for over a year. Outside the camera works ok and most pictures turn out good enough. Indoors this camera is a nightmare. Once the camera finally decides to take a picture, after a 45 second lag, the result is usually horrible. I've wasted too much time with the pile of garbage. I want my $150 back please! It seems this camera had sooo many features it doens't know what it is trying to do. Recognize face? stabilize? focus? Nah, just take a blurry photo after waiting FOREVER! OK I'm done

Reviews.Title: WANT TO REPLACE IT WITHIN A YEAR??!-BUYER BEWARE
Reviews.Author: Merl Albert
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera. I think a lot of the reviews are written shortly after purchase. I owned this for approximately 6 or 7 months before I got the error, after charging the battery, "For use with compatible battery only" It is the battery that came with the camera. A new battery, $48,  does not resolve the problem. I strongly advise you to google up this Sony model and the error I just quoted and you will find a great many posts complaining of this defect. Sony will do nothing to stand behind it. By the time you pay the repair fee, you may as well buy a new camera---another brand of course. Back to Canon and their reliability. Buyer beware!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: TerLow "gorgeousinside"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for this price range. Wonderfulimages and on screen editing. I have bought two because I lost the one I previously had. I would buy another if I needed to.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: shopalot
Reviews.Content: Well I was disappointed with this camera, it takes to long to take a photo and you end up missing those moments when your kids do something so precious and the pictures turn out blurry! I Mainly bought this camera to upgrade my old Kodak because it was too slow and I was  missing to many amazing photos of my children, so problem not fixed unfortunately. Would not recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: just wonderful
Reviews.Author: Neyla  Johanna Moronta Hinestroza
Reviews.Content: They represent more than one brand, a commitment to the customer, who expects a better service delivery. Catalog as a product of high quality. I am very pleased with this investment. I therefore recommend this brand to the community widely Amazon in the world.

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY THIS CAMERA ... YOU LOSE YOUR MONEY
Reviews.Author: Sankara Thamaraivinayagam "Edison Techie"
Reviews.Content: As mentioned by many customers, Images are very fuzzy.No drops or any sort of slight damages done to the camera.After 4 monthsfor no apparent reason it failed.I am a big fan of sony.Hmm.. this sony product to me failed .Lot of reviews said the sameDid I buy a lemon ?... or this model itself a lemon ?.... No idea.Atleast Think TWICE before you buy it

Reviews.Title: piece of crap
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: Spend the extra $ and get a better camera.  I paid $90 for mine at office max.  Would have been better off with a cheap Kodak.  The software is terrible and the features of the camera are pathetic.

Reviews.Title: Date on Picture
Reviews.Author: whosthatgurl1
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera I have owned. The pictures are beautiful and have brilliant colors. The one disadvantage is that it doesn't have the option to put the time and date on the picture and since I used this a lot for work, it has become obvious that I might have to look at a different camera. I also don't like that I have to turn the flash off all the time.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC-W330 14.1 MP Digital Camera Bought at Amazon
Reviews.Author: RitaPsych1@aol.com
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my husband for his birthday. He is not very technologically savvy. So far, he's figured out how to charge the battery, take pictures, insert the memory stick and transfer his pictures to his laptop. The pictures come out very focused and clear. He is so proud of the images he captures!Sony DSC-W330 14.1MP Digital Camera with 4x Wide Angle Zoom with Digital Steady Shot Image Stabilization and 3.0 inch LCD (Silver)I've got a Casio Z9 and we're always comparing photos. This Sony DSC-W330 camera takes much clearer pictures than my Casio. If you're shopping for a user-friendly camera that takes very clear images, this is it!

Reviews.Title: This is a great camera!
Reviews.Author: Lorraine LaChapelle
Reviews.Content: I have used this camera both in single shot mode and video mode and it works great.  It takes very clear pictures, it is lightweight and easy to use.  Would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC
Reviews.Author: Kim Coleman
Reviews.Content: This was also purchased as an insurance settlement and it went to my grandson he loves it. it takes very good pictures

Reviews.Title: strshine3
Reviews.Author: strshine
Reviews.Content: Love this Sony Digital Camera.  Take beautiful quality pictures.  I must buy if you are needing a camera.

Reviews.Title: execellent!
Reviews.Author: Rafa
Reviews.Content: very gooood! thanks muy bueno. vino en excelentes condiciones, no tiene ni un solo rayon, vino con varios accesorios. vino tambien como nueva! en realidad fue muy buena compra, me gusto mucho. gracias

Reviews.Title: Best camera I've ever held
Reviews.Author: Jim Walker
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera! never have i seen such picture quality, I'm amazed on how clear the picture and video comes out. It is a very remarkable camera, and the anti shake really helps a lot, as my hands can't stay still for anything.

Reviews.Title: Great buy for the price !
Reviews.Author: Hazel
Reviews.Content: The camera is great for the price, the only thing I didn't like is that I have to take the battery out of the camera to charge it, other than that is an awsome camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: Great camera, so far I like every thing about this camera, but its still new. I have not had any problems with this camera.I would recommend this camera to my friends.

Reviews.Title: awesome deal and amazing quality
Reviews.Author: excitablesm "sm"
Reviews.Content: Saw this great price in my Target ad- and searched to make sure it was as good as it sounded.Great reviews, then saw Amazon had the deal thru Target. this saved me a trip on a busy week,and I happened to have an Amazon coupon. Extra good deal!Just got to start using it recently on a vacation- SO easy to carry in my purse, and the color isgreat when there are several friends all with 'silver' cameras who have them all out on the table at dinner.Very happy with this purchase- the shipping was fast!

Reviews.Title: Not reliable, lousy pictures, total junk...wish I bought something else
Reviews.Author: E_Dogg
Reviews.Content: Like many of the other 1-star ratings, I found that this camera is slow, unstable, unreliable, unadjustible, and takes terribly grainy, washed out, underwhelming photos with obvious filtering flaws. I never got to return it becuase it worked OK for the first year -- and then failed over the next 6-months. There's so many other good cameras on the market in the same price range with similar features...so stay away from this junk.Sony - you blew it - again. Fool me once, shame on you. Fool me twice - shame on me.Eric.

Reviews.Title: sony camera
Reviews.Author: collegestudent
Reviews.Content: bought this camera in hot pink from walmart.com and love it so far!!!!  The only thing I slightly dislike is how easily the battery and memory compartment comes open.  Just the brush of the finger can pop it open!  the camera automatically changes the type of shot taken by how much light is in the room!  its a nice feature!  so far so good!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Mel
Reviews.Content: Easy to operate !! Although my usage has been limited, so far I"m happy with the results of my photos. Take into account the price I paid and it's a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Sony Junkie
Reviews.Author: W. Jordan "Low-Key Collector"
Reviews.Content: This is my second Cyber-Shot camera. This one takes excellent photos just like its predecessor. My only complaint is that the button to take the pictures is recessed more than on my previous camera. It's more difficult to snap the perfect photo when you cannot find the button. The power button is even more recessed. Other than that, this is a great camera and I've already taken some great shots with it.

Reviews.Title: Great for the lady of the house
Reviews.Author: rainbird
Reviews.Content: It was as advertized. My wife loves it with the big viewer and easy to operate.  She really likes the color and one of reasons she picked it.  Have not use the Video yet. She points and shoots everything with an 8G in it!

Reviews.Title: My 2 year old gets it
Reviews.Author: Bird Mom
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera when I needed to replace my Kodak. I purchased it because of the price, and color, I figured I would be safe because of the MP and good reviews.  I have had the camera for about 6 months. I hate the camera.  My biggest complaint is how long it takes to take a picture! It only actually takes the picture about 1/3 of the time. Whether I hold the button half down or not, it either takes too long, til I've missed the shot, or just doesn't take.  When we go anywhere that I need to take pictures I take this one and my old Kodak, and I honestly, every time, end up so frustrated with this one that I give it to my 2 year old to keep him entertained and just use my Kodak until the battery dies.There is no consistancy in the quality of pictures, or if it will even get the shot at all! After paying this much on a camera I am back to needing to buy another one, hopefully spending more money on a camera will make a difference, because this one is useless.

Reviews.Title: Love it for the price, but unimpressive low light picture quality
Reviews.Author: Ajay K. Pedhagandham "AJ"
Reviews.Content: Bought it to gift it to a relative. Took a few shots with it and noticed that pictures taken indoors are not that great, but overall it is a very good camera for the price. My wife loved the color, and wanted to replace our old silver one.

Reviews.Title: A nice camera but could be better
Reviews.Author: Leeno
Reviews.Content: This is a nice camera.  It's quite compact and light weight.  Previously I had always used Canon cameras so it has been a little difficult to adjust to.  I'm still looking for an attribute I prefer over Canon but that hasn't happened yet.As far as the purchase it was at the lowest possible price, arrived on time and was in excellent condition so I would consider it a great deal.  Only time will tell if I like the photos and how durable it will turn out to be.

Reviews.Title: Pleased
Reviews.Author: S. Clement
Reviews.Content: I was so happy to be shopping for a new camera and after reading the reviews on Amazon I decided to purchase this one with my Christmas gift money. I am so pleased and happy I did. The pictures are wonderful with great clarity. It's easy to use and I like the size!

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: twothdoc
Reviews.Content: I have had the sony dsc-w290 for a while now and figured this camera would be comparable to its quality.  It isn't even close.  It is made cheap unlike the dsc-w290.  Returned the item and bought a canon s95.  It was much more expensive but MUCH better quality.  You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Great everyday camera
Reviews.Author: D. Fiorito
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera to carry all the time. It has two slots to accept an SD card and the sony stick. Excellent quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: For Non-Flash Photography Only
Reviews.Author: APod
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace my old Sony Cybershot, a camera that I really loved. To my great disappointment, this camera is nothing like it! While it does take some nice photos during the day when there is good sunlight, as soon as you need to use the flash, the photos do not turn out at all. The pictures become blurry and often they are all red (redscale instead of grayscale if you will) because of an auto-detect flash setting function built in to the camera. I tried to manually change around the flash settings but to little success; the photos were still very much sub-par and not at all what I would expect from this camera.
