This happened during a family outing to look at Christmas lights, so it is particularly unfortunate that we won't have many good photo memories from that trip. The one time the camera did take great shots was when I took some close-ups of flowers indoors, with good lighting (also during the same outing). Therefore, if you plan on using this at all during the night,the camera's convenient size allows it to fit into a small hangbag but don't be fooled. You will almost be better off not bringing a camera because you won't be able to use any of the photos anyways. I already returned it but now I'm also having issues getting my money back. An all-around disaster!

Reviews.Title: Nice decent camera
Reviews.Author: klumsylillbunny
Reviews.Content: nice decent camera for everyday use or for trips. light weigh and slim. great looking in black. have no problems with it yet...just wished that it would have came with a pouch and sd card.

Reviews.Title: Love love love
Reviews.Author: Goz
Reviews.Content: I love this camera...you should get it. It is a good deal for all its features. I have had it for 7 months now and totally loving it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for beginners
Reviews.Author: Andreazio "AndreaZio"
Reviews.Content: This camera is exactly what I was looking for: something easy to use in all conditions (the easy mode quickly select the best parameters for shooting), but at the same time, easy to configure manually (for a more expert use). The quality of the pictures is excellent. It's light (and tiny) enough to be carried around in a pocket. The battery lasted a few days, surviving the low temperatures of high mountains. If someone wants to be on the safest side, I'd recommend buying a second battery.

Reviews.Title: sony digital camera
Reviews.Author: library junkie
Reviews.Content: Good value for the money.  Was a gift for son.  He did research, and claims it works as expected.

Reviews.Title: This camera is a good value
Reviews.Author: yelleah
Reviews.Content: I am SO pleased with this purchase.  It's my second Cybershot.  I love the image stabalization and the ability to take pics quick since I have a 5-yr-old granddaughter.  It's easy to navigate and makes really quality photos for the price.

Reviews.Title: Sony 14.1 MP digital camera -GREAT
Reviews.Author: GABOR
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the camera and the great pictures I have taken . It is small ,thin and very portable. Fits into  your jacket. I took it hiking during the Christmas  vacation. I took many excellent pics with it .I highly recommend it.I also like the fast a ship free delivery after Thanks Giving.Sony DSC-W330 14.1MP Digital Camera with 4x Wide Angle Zoom with Digital Steady Shot Image Stabilization and 3.0 inch LCD (Black)

Reviews.Title: Excellent, Couldn't Be Happier
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera on Black Friday. I'm a huge fan of Sony cameras. I had a Sony Cybershot DSC-W55 in pink as my first camera. It was EXCELLENT. Absolutely no complaints about it. It took wonderful pictures. It had an even better battery life.I charged it all night the night before and took it to Warped Tour with me this past summer. WOW! It lasted all day long. By all day, I mean from 7AM to 10:30PM. I was turning it on & off all day, taking pictures all day, filming movies all day. It was crazy! At the end of the day when my friend's cousins picked us up, we took a good 10 minutes looking at the pictures we took. Still, it was hanging on. I even had enough battery life left to upload the pictures the next day.So of course when it stopped working after three long, hard, rough years, I wanted to get another Sony. I'm very pleased & impressed! Its compact enough that I can put it in my front pocket and forget its there. My last camera was somewhat chunky. It takes GREAT pictures when there's a great light source. I don't like using flash but sometimes you have to. If you can't get a good natural light source, might I suggest pressing the shutter button half way down until you hear the click and then take a picture. It helps the photo focus. It also has a good battery life. I got it on December 8th and it didn't need to be charged until December 17th. My cousin loved my camera so much that she got the same one in the same color(blue). Overall, we're both quite satisfied with our cameras. I would definitely buy this again.I can't wait to take it with me when I go see The Ready Set in March and Warped Tour in July!Bravo Sony.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good!
Reviews.Author: A. Scoggins
Reviews.Content: This camera was a gift for my 9 year old daughter. It's easy enough for her to figure out without any help. The pictures look great to me...I'm not an expert, by any means, but I'm very satisfied with the image quality. She and I have both taken photos in a wide variety of settings...inside, outside, nighttime, etc. Even the pictures we took of Christmas lights on a house at night turned out pretty decent. We've mostly used the intelligent auto setting, but we've played around with the scene modes as well. Very easy to use. The battery life seems adequate, and overall it seems like a great camera for general use. We paid $129 for this camera, and for that price, I don't think you could do much better. I gave this camera 4 stars because, although it seems great to us, we are not very knowledgable about cameras and we've only owned this for a short time. In the end, it may turn out to be a 5 star camera for the price range, but only time will tell.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC-W330
Reviews.Author: Yiamthe1 "Yiamthe1"
Reviews.Content: It arrived and I try it out.  It is a very fine camera.  Serve the completed purpose for a camera.  Nice picture quality, face detection is awsome. If you need easy to use camera.  This one is very nice.

Reviews.Title: Sony Dsc-W330,14.1MP Digital Camera is excellent
Reviews.Author: pravin
Reviews.Content: Although price offered saved about 10 to 15% but if accesories like Memory Stick and Carrying Case at reasonable price would have been offered as a package then it would have been good.

Reviews.Title: almost a five star
Reviews.Author: Norman G. Mcintosh
Reviews.Content: Nice camera--takes excellent pictures and is easy to use. Would have gave it 5 stars if the zoom feature would work in the video mode.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures -while it lasts
Reviews.Author: TN reader
Reviews.Content: I bought the Sony DSC-W330 camera to serve as a handy pocket camera to use when taking a large DSLR is just impractical.I carried this camera around for a few days when it arrived and took 234 photos in nearly every conceivable condition.  I was pleasantly surprised to see how well this camera performed in some tricky situations. Even in the auto "just push the button" mode the pictures were very good. They had crisp sharp lines and the colors were very true to life in almost all of the images even in low light and back lit conditions.That being said, I have some serious concerns about how long the camera will last.  I cringed as I opened and shut the delicate latch for the battery and memory card.  The door is so delicately attached  and the tiny latch that holds them in is plastic and looks and feels very flimsy.  Same concerns on the door that covers the port for downloading images to the computer.  In those respects it seems almost like a toy.  I simply can't imagine it holding up for long under normal use.  My Nikon Coolpix from 4 years ago looks like a dinosaur in comparison but has taken thousands of pictures and traveled all over the world without a hiccup.  In order to get the thin, compact design we may have to settle for components that are a far cry from durable and rugged.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC-W330
Reviews.Author: Sachin Khade
Reviews.Content: Hey, i bought this camera for my friend, it is one of the best and affordable point and shoot camera with great megapixel...also the picture quality is great...This is good camera for anyone, easy to handle no need to go through any manuals....just start using it..

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: Kimberly
Reviews.Content: This camera is not worth the money. I bought it at Wal-mart on black friday. I returned it today. The screen was so noisy/fuzzy. The shutter was hard to only press halfway down, most of the time it just took out of focus pictures. Picture quality was okay, but every picture seemed to turn out the same no matter what setting I had it on. Totally generic. You can't really customize much---and I am pretty sure there was no b/w, sepia, etc? I didn't even bother wasting my time loading the pdf manual because I knew I'd be returning this camera.I prefer my 5 year old kodak easy share 4 MP over this sony. Well, I prefer the samsung sl202 (which I am borrowing from a friend). The samsung has taken amazing pictures. Sony....not your best work.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE CAMERA; HORRIBLE SUPPORT
Reviews.Author: Ping Porsche
Reviews.Content: WHY CAN'T I GIVE NEGATIVE STARS?DON'T BUY THIS OR ANY OTHER SONY CAMERA!!!!!Sony makes crap cameras and their support will accuse you of breaking it.Purchase from a respectable camera maker like Canon, Nikon, or Fuji.I bought this for snorkeling and it corrupted my memory card on the first trip.OK, $10,000 trip with no pictures, because the camera corrupted the memory.Called Sony and they blamed the memory.Got two new memory cards for the next trip.OK, new trip, $5k trip with no pictures because the entire stupid camera craps out.Called Sony, no apologies, no emergency loaner, just a send it in with the receipt so we can verify it's still under warranty.Sent the camera in to the depot, on my own dime.They call and accused me of opening the camera door.What idiots! Why the hell would I do that? So I can ruin my pictures?  TWICE????!!!!!I contacted all the way up to national customer support.All idiots along the way.They didn't do a user test underwater.They just dunk it and say it's still WATER-RESISTANT, so it must be user error.F#$% OFF SONY!!!!Whatever you do, buy something else and save your money, this is a horrible product, that takes horrible pictures and is slow as mud, with a horrible touchscreen that doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: too slow not good.
Reviews.Author: pv
Reviews.Content: We have used this for just one day.  The delay is horrible it can not take clear pictures in front of the christmas tree.  I do like the screen but that's about it.I am returning ASAP and getting a canon.

Reviews.Title: Piece of plastic
Reviews.Author: Bacardi
Reviews.Content: Ordered this camera over the weekend and received it few mins back; it is a piece of plastic. Took about 20 pictures inside my apartments to test the different features.The pictures were soft, lots of noise at high ISO and dark, not so great navigation.I have always been a canon fan, this was the first time i bought Sony digital point and shoot as i did not want to spend a lot. However i am highly disappointed with the quality of the camera and its pictures.Sony has used cheap material to build this model, which i never expected, and selling it at a price which i think is little too much for the quality of the camera; at this price there are many better camera in market than this model(Canon SD1300, Canon A3100). I am planning to return it but the seller is charging me 20% restocking fee, so even i am not happy with the camera it will cost me $$ to return it.The seller's customer service was not so friendly when i told them that i wanted to return the camera, the customer service guy over the phone said, " a camera is suppose to take pictures and this one does that so we do not find anything wrong with that".  I will speak to their customer service manager tomorrow and see if they can take the camera back without charging the restocking fee.This was the first time i used Electronic Expo and i am planning not to order any item from them again.My recommendation : Do not buy this camera, it is a waste of your $$.

Reviews.Title: YOMIRA BELLORIN
Reviews.Author: Yomira Bellorin
Reviews.Content: EXCELENTE PRODUCTO. LLEGO EN BUEN ESTADO A VENEZUELA. CAMARA  DE GRAN CALIDAD. RECOMIENDO AL VENDEDOR RESPONSABLE Y EFECTIVO. ESPERO PODER DISFRUTAR OTROS PRODUCTOS

Reviews.Title: They send the wrong information cable and no memory card! It's useless...
Reviews.Author: copshop88
Reviews.Content: They send the wrong information cable! does not fit... It's useless the camera without cable or memory card... watch out!

Reviews.Title: terrible
Reviews.Author: thudson
Reviews.Content: Camera barely even works, wont take proper pics half the time, the lens blacks out or projects colorful lines insetad of taking a clear pic

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: JennEzell
Reviews.Content: Stopped working a couple months after I bought it:( I was so sad. I went on a trip and missed pictures:(

Reviews.Title: Pedido no recibido
Reviews.Author: Jose Flores
Reviews.Content: Manifiesto mi inconformidad porque no recibi mi orden y en vendedor no se mostro interesado en garantizar la entrega de dicha orden.

Reviews.Title: Video lags
Reviews.Author: amazonaddictee
Reviews.Content: I just used the video feature and it lags!  Bad product if based on my video experience. Photos are decent for the price.

Reviews.Title: Sony is Sony and anymore
Reviews.Author: Waltersog
Reviews.Content: Sony is Sony definitely you don't need to be a expert to see the advantage you have when you buy Sony's products.

Reviews.Title: Battery
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Pernalete "Gustavo"
Reviews.Content: I need some help, somebody can say me if the battery NP-BG1 (type G ) fix to this camera? thanks

Reviews.Title: good camera but i wish pictures weren't so blurry
Reviews.Author: Nha
Reviews.Content: takes good pictures but it takes 2/3 shots to get a good picture because it came out blurry. It takes alot of blurry pictures so I returned it. I really like the quality of the pictures, wish it did better and not be so blurry. The big screen is nice to have too.

Reviews.Title: Decent, but not great.
Reviews.Author: J. Demond "Frell you"
Reviews.Content: This camera is fast to take and store pictures.It can record to the Sony Duo cards, as well as SD cards. Recording to SD makes it nearly equal to standard cameras.Quality and construction are decent. It feels like a quality camera, and it's ability to take stunning pictures is right up there.The downside is there is no forced macro. It's up to the camera to go into macro mode whilst in smart mode.That alone should be a no buy. There is also no auto focus lamp, and pushing the shutter button to the half way point to focus the camera is very hard.There is almost no area there to stop and hold.Half the time the camera will take a shot without focusing correctly.One other little thing I don't like is the lag while reviewing stored photographs.There is about a 1 second lag whilst scrolling from shot to shot.It does it with both Sony Pro Duo 4gb cards I have, and the three Sandisk 8gb SD cards I have.While I am not moved to return the camera, I wouldn't buy a second one.

Reviews.Title: Did not measure up.
Reviews.Author: amolba
Reviews.Content: I researched this item before ordering. The test photos I tried did not come close to those online.  I have used many digital point and shoot (Canon, Lumix, Olympus) and have a DSLR.  Even though higher megapixels, this camera did not measure up to any of those. I returned it.  The only advantage is its size.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera in such a low price..but i just disappoint...
Reviews.Author: Deep Gill
Reviews.Content: I placed order for a new one but a camera that i receive does not look like the new one..it has some marks of fingerprints on screen..and the packing they did is low quality..other camera is good and a best option at such a reasonable price..picture quality was too good....

Reviews.Title: I'm sorry that I bought this camera!
Reviews.Author: Suzanne
Reviews.Content: This camera just wasn't worth the money for me.  First off, I wanted a RED camera.  The backside of this camera is red; the frontside is hot pink.  It's clearly two different colors.  Secondly, if you do buy this camera, make sure that you have a case for it - it scratches extremely easily.  The pictures come out fine, and it is small and lightweight, but I wish I had gotten a different camera.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money!
Reviews.Author: April M.
Reviews.Content: I'll start by saying that I've always been a loyal customer to Sony & this makes my third purchase of a Sony camera. My previous cam was a DSC-W55 and at 7.2 MP that baby packed quite a punch, great quality & very user friendly, which is why I didn't want to stray away from the brand when I decided to purchase another. So I've had the DSC-W330 for about 2 months now and I must say that i'm highly disappointed. I made the purchase thinking it was an upgrade from my last, boy was I wrong. One of my main gripes about this camera is the picture quality. I've tried just about every setting on this camera but the clarity of my photos remain shadowed, blurry and some have a reddish undertone to them. The best photos I've taken with this cam is in direct sunlight outside, no flash. The clarity of the photos don't give a sense of reality at all, especially up close pics have the tendency to look airbrushed & blurred. The flash tends to take away from the clarity & detail as well. It's also really slow when shooting, so if you're trying to capture something really quick its NOT gonna happen. I've played around with it for 2 months to no avail and I've finally decided to just return it and save up for the Cybershot HX1. I wouldn't recommend this camera to anyone, it's definitely a down grade from my previous one. It's cute & compact but that's about it, definitely not worth the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Awful. . .
Reviews.Author: P. Landry
Reviews.Content: I misplaced my old Sony camera before a trip to Colorado. In need of a camera, I purchased this model. To say it was disappointing is an understatement. It never saw the same things that I saw. It took shots that were either too light or two dark every time, and when light AND dark were in the same scene, it handled it miserably. Landscapes were particularly terrible.My previous Sony was brilliant, but i should have canned this model when I noticed that there were no real adjustments that could be made. It has no external knob to dial in settings. Also hugely annoying is having to shut off the flash every time it is started. Like I need a flash to take a mountain scene.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY SONY CAMERAS
Reviews.Author: nycshopper
Reviews.Content: PLEASE DO YOURSELF A FAVOR AND DO NOT BUY A SONY DIGITAL CAMERA.My digital camera started VIBRATING and is effectively UNUSABLE because of this vibration. It vibrates like a cell phone, and you can't focus on an image, everything is shaken and blurred.A lot of Sony's digital cameras seem to suffer from this issue, and the DSC-T20 has been recalled! But Sony REFUSES to fix any other models than DSC-T20 that have the SAME issue.They  have TERRIBLE customer service and an even WORSE product.I will NEVER buy another Sony product again.Do yourself a favor and go buy a nice Canon or Nikon. DO NOT BUY SONY. ITS IS A PIECE OF #*&@ that even Sony refuses to fix!! >:(

Reviews.Title: Really BAD camera... don't waste money and time
Reviews.Author: Bualan
Reviews.Content: I owned a 7.2 cybershot Sony camera and I loved it. Then I bought this one with high hopes it's going to be more than I expected.. But this is a nightmare. Photos are either so blurry, dark or so bright.. I've tried different settings and everything.. but it came out the same...My gosh Sony you just killed your household name with this camera.. Don't buy this camera... Believe me you will regret if you will buy it.

Reviews.Title: Would Give a 5 Star if not for the audio
Reviews.Author: Muhaz
Reviews.Content: This is a very good camera compared to the other brands for a price range under 200 dollars. I first wanted to get a nikon, but then after reading the reviews i gave up my idea on nikon, buh the nikon slr had gud reviews, but that was not in my budget. I like almost everything about this camera has great megapixels, compact camera with a nice finish. But when it comes to video i noticed that the volume on the camera is not so great, i first thiought that i get a defective camera because compared to my old fuji camera, the volume was really low, so i called sony to find out if there is something wrong with the camera, and they told me to hook this to a tv to check the volume, but i sill had to crank the volume half way on the tv , and they said they said its nothing wrong with the camera, the speaker compared to tv is small in the camera. But overall its a good camera, picture quality is great, easy to use, and has a nice finish.

Reviews.Title: Slow camara
Reviews.Author: Yai "YAV"
Reviews.Content: Nice looking camara with a lot of good features. The only big problem "is very slow taking pictures".

Reviews.Title: Best compact digital camera ever!
Reviews.Author: Jwb
Reviews.Content: Actually I never even used the thing. Here in Kandahar, there are precisely 1 billion TCNs. If you're not familiar with the term, TCN stands for third country national. They aren't from NATO or ISAF nations, and aren't citizens of the host nation. Anyway, I digress..Whomever told the TCNs about Amazon deserves a swift karate chop in the throat because these dudes will come up to you day and night asking you to order stuff. It will be weird stuff that will have no apparent effect on their quality of life back home, but they MUST have the stuff for whatever reason. That said, it isn't easy telling the poor buggers no, so I end up spending a small truckload of money on this site each month.This camera is a prime example. The dude we're talking about in this case comes from a place where, I imagine, indoor plumbing probably doesn't exist yet, electricity may or may not be present, and his 25 kids most likely don't wear shoes.Who needs any of that when you've got a sweet new camera?? Now you can take photos of all the poverty and squalor and upload them to your favorite social networking site! Yay! Assuming first, of course, you hit somebody else up to order you a laptop, then you bothered another 4 guys for all the accessories, peripherals, carrying cases, etc. Once all those bases are covered, and you find a dialup connection somewhere in the village, you'll be living the TCN dream.I really would've liked to try this camera out, but at the end of the month when I see my credit card bill, I can't bring myself to spend money on the things I want. That's about the end of my rant I suppose. If you ever meet a TCN, thank him for keeping the US Postal Service alive, and ask if you can see his s***ty pictures. You get 10 extra points if he's wearing a US Polo Assn watch also ordered from Amazon. Out.

Reviews.Title: Sony Gets Worse!
Reviews.Author: Kristine
Reviews.Content: I got this camera when my dad and I both bought one for my mom for Christmas. I bought my mom a Nikon Coolpix with touchscreen and my dad got the Sony Cybershot. I needed a new point and shoot anyway so he gave me this one. I tried it and immediately hated it. First of all, I have owned a previous model of the Cybershot before and I LOVE it. I've never had any issues with it except that it's rather old. On a 1GB card, I could take at least 500 photos with a 3M setting. I could also take at least 2 hours worth of video (that's WITH those 500 photos) When I tried out this camera, (with the same 1GB card) I saw that I could only take 8 minutes worth of video! That's after I deleted most of my photos leaving about 50 left on the card. The one nice thing about the camera is the way it lets you delete photos, where you can select multiple photos to delete instead of going through and deleting one by one.My other huge issue is the fact that it's a wide angle lens. WHO SHOOTS PEOPLE IN WIDE ANGLE???? It is not flattering at ALL! Needless to say, I'm returning this product and either I'm going to deal with my old reliable camera, or go out and buy the same Nikon that I got my mom.

Reviews.Title: Received in a poorly packaged condition
Reviews.Author: Walter Suminski
Reviews.Content: This item was ordered as a gift and was gift wrapped as ordered.  When received in a box with "zero" packaging material, all corners of the gift wrapped package was worn because it was allowed to bang around inside.  There may very well be damage to the camera inside.  Because it was ordered as a gift, and so wrapped, I have not opened it up to inspect it.  I hate to think that I may be giving a gift that is damaged.  This is the very first time in the many orders I have placed with Amazon that packaging was inadequate and it couldn't have come at a worst time.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC-W330 14.1MP Digital Camera with 4x Wide Angle Zoom with Digital Steady Shot Image Stabilization and 3.0 inch LCD (Silve
Reviews.Author: RA
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the camera. The only disadvantage is the limitation of the optics, but this is a matter of fact for this type of camera.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Kate
Reviews.Content: I like this camera very much. It works very well. Thank you my dear Amazon. I wish I could buy kindle, but it's very expensive for me.

Reviews.Title: Slow, slow, slow
Reviews.Author: H. Le
Reviews.Content: This is the first digital camera I have owned that had a very noticeable lag when viewing images on the screen.  Image would take a few seconds to appear.  if you are going to view  a lot of pictures, the lag gets extremley annoying.  The shutter speed is also very slow.  Disappointing for a Sony.  Picture quality was okay, but nothing special.  Only 4x zoom.  Have to remove battery to charge it, when a lot of cameras allow you to recharge it directly.  Hinges and covers are really cheap feeling.  Overall, this is a really cheaply made camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent gift item
Reviews.Author: Asim Rasheed Mian
Reviews.Content: I bought it as a gift for my friend and he likes it a lot as compared to his older one!

Reviews.Title: What camera are you guys talking about?
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera and was so excited to open it. As a semi-professional photographer, I have some standards that I expect from a modern 12st century camera. All the reviews here made this camera sound fantastic. I made the splurge. I have not owned a Point And Shoot for years.Where can I start? When I first put the battery into the camera, I noticed the plastic door to hold the battery in. It felt like it was just going to break off if I was not careful. I work at a zoo, I need a durable camera I can put in my pocket and take around with me without worrying that parts are going to break off. I turned on the camera and literally heard and felt every component in the camera turn on. The motor shakes the camera when the lens is zooming in or out and the zoom is so noisy for being such a small zoom.The buttons feel so cheap. Every singly button is loose. When the lens is extended the whole thing slides around if you touch it.I would not recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Never received
Reviews.Author: Jackie Galvin "Jackies Reviews"
Reviews.Content: Should have used UPS instead of the unreliable United States Post Office as they say it was delivered, but never was delivered to me! Expedited delivery was for 1-3 days, ordered on Dec 27 for New years eve. Here it is Jan 4th and no camera! Thanks a lot
